abstract.title: Summary
abstract.p: In the absence of an efficient drug treatment or a vaccine, the control of the COVID‚Äê19 pandemic relies on classic infection control measures. Since these means are socially disruptive and come with substantial economic loss for societies, a better knowledge of the epidemiology of the new coronavirus epidemic is crucial to achieve control at a sustainable cost, and within tolerable restrictions of civil rights.
